definition: universal/encyclopedic/abbr. for 百科全書|百科全书[bai3 ke1 quan2 shu1]
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Da4 Bai3 ke1 Quan2 shu1 Chu1 ban3 she4
containing_words.word: 中國大百科全書出版社

sentences.english: The encyclopedia thudded onto the floor.
sentences.chinese: 那本百科全書砰地掉在地板上。

sentences.english: "I could look in the encyclopedia, " she said to herself.
sentences.chinese: “我可以去查百科全書，”姍姍自言自語道。
一個在線協作的百科全書。

sentences.english: They were still driving away at the encyclopaedia.
sentences.chinese: 他們仍在孜孜不倦地編寫那部百科全書。

sentences.english: An encyclopedia embraces a great number of subjects.
sentences.chinese: 一部百科全書包含許多學科。

sentences.english: Even Fan’s Wikipedia page had already been updated with a line referring to the incident.
sentences.chinese: 甚至連方濱興的維基百科頁面也已經做出了相關更新。

sentences.english: Actually introduced by making the king back to my clothes, royal clothing, such as Encyclopedia of the book.
sentences.chinese: 其實介紹了使國王回到我的衣服，王服，如百科書。

sentences.english: The next day, I looked up Asperger’s syndrome on Wikipedia.
sentences.chinese: 第二天我在維基百科上查了查阿斯伯格綜合症。

sentences.english: The entire English section of Wikipedia, dumped into a machine readable format.
sentences.chinese: 維基百科的全部英文條目，轉儲爲機器可讀的格式。

sentences.english: That’s why Wikipedia is an ideal candidate to set the World Heritage List right.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲什麼維基百科被題名列入世界遺產之列。
我們買了一套多媒體百科全書。
維基百科，我理解，歡迎更正。

sentences.english: We tabbed him as a walking encyclopaedia.
sentences.chinese: 我們管他叫活百科全書。

sentences.english: This business news tracking service uses Wikipedia to train its recommendation engines.
sentences.chinese: 這種商業新聞跟蹤服務使用維基百科完善其推薦引擎。

sentences.english: See also the Muggle Encyclopedia entry for the Wye River.
sentences.chinese: 參見《麻瓜百科全書》裏關於瓦伊河的詞條。

sentences.english: You will find the explanation in the encyclopedia .
sentences.chinese: 你可以在百科全書中找到解釋。

definition: popular science/popularization of science/abbr. of 科學普及|科学普及
alternative name for Baidu 百度[Bai3 du4]
Zhihu, Chinese Q&A website modeled on Quora, at zhihu.com, launched in Jan 2011
Baidu Knows, online Q & A forum, zhidao.baidu.com
source (esp. of quotation or literary allusion)/origin/where sth comes from
